entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy in onshore winds early this evening. Becoming cloudy this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High plus 4.
